no_personajes_suficientes: Not enough characters to form a team.
team_recom_best_epi: These are the best epiphanies recommended for this team
haru_epi_2: Increases the number of Anchor Shot hits and removes the charge requirement
haru_epi_3: Increases the number of uses of Anchor Pointer
haru_epi_5: If you didn’t get the critical chance upgrade, this is a decent option
haru_epi_6: Adds permanent Retain to Anchor Shot
haru_epi_7: Situational but decent if you have good crit.
haru_epi_9: Activates once more if it kills
haru_epi_12: Change to Upgrade, it's a permanent buff
haru_epi_13: Turns the buff additive so it improves Anchor Shot by +1 hit
haru_epi_14: Helps cycle and draw attack cards
haru_set_1: Boosts Haru's critical chance by 20% on many of her cards
khalipe_epi_2: Allows you to choose what to draw.
khalipe_epi_3: Increases the original's damage and shield.
khalipe_epi_vulture_5: Gives more shield the more cards you have.
khalipe_epi_overpower_1: Provides extra tenacity that helps recover AP.
khalipe_epi_overpower_2: Good general option, weaken and vulnerable are good debuffs.
khalipe_epi_overpower_3: If played at the start of the turn or when drawing cards, it can provide a lot of shield.
khalipe_epi_greatsword_3: Adds retrieve, which increases the number of times it can be used.
khalipe_set_1: Increases critical chance for almost her entire kit.
khalipe_set_2: Triple set, general for many characters.
khalipe_set_3: Khalipe has a lot of tenacity so she can activate the set (situational).
khalipe_set_4: If you have any card draw it can be useful (situational).
tressa_epi_1: Allows creating infinite daggers when healing.
tressa_epi_unsheathedagger_2: Gains exhaust and generates 2 more daggers, works well with the Shadow Reload upgrade build.
tressa_epi_unsheathedagger_4: Turns it into an upgrade, generates 1 dagger per turn permanently.
chizuru_epi_onihunt_1: Oni Hunt with 4 hits to charge more Bind.
chizuru_epi_onihunt_2: Creates 2 basic cards with cost 0, helps combo with Tsukuyomi upgrade.
chizuru_epi_onihunt_3: Further increases Shadow of the Moon damage, helps combo with Tsukuyomi +2 hits to Shadow of the Moon.
chizuru_epi_tsukuyomi_1: Adds +2 hits to Shadow of the Moon (stacks when played multiple times).
chizuru_epi_tsukuyomi_2: Helps generate much more Bind (stacks when played multiple times).
chizuru_epi_tsukuyomi_3: Adds 1 hit to the next card and generates more Bind (stacks when played multiple times).
chizuru_epi_tsukuyomi_4: Upgrade that permanently gives Bind without needing the curse, combos with Tsukuyomi that creates Moonslash.
chizuru_epi_bounddusk_1: Reduces the cost of 2 cards by 1, mitigating not being able to generate AP.
chizuru_epi_bounddusk_2: Activates 2 cards from other characters, very random but mitigates not being able to generate AP.
chizuru_epi_karmicflames_1: Adds 1 hit if the target already has the curse.
chizuru_epi_karmicflames_2: Reduces the cost of the next card by 1 if the target already has the curse.
chizuru_epi_karmicflames_3: Increases damage if the target already has the curse.
chizuru_set_1: Triple set, a good general option.
mika_epi_sourceofwater_1: Adding retain gives you the option to use it in a better situation.
mika_epi_sourceofwater_2: Wave is very general due to AP generation.
mika_epi_sourceofwater_3: Especially useful in teams with lots of healing.
mika_epi_tacticalanalysis_2: Healing, especially useful for Tressa’s Shadow Reload upgrade.
mika_epi_tacticalanalysis_3: Upgrade, so it doesn’t take up space, and increases healing.
mika_epi_tacticalanalysis_4: Double wave is almost 1 AP and doubles healing.
mika_epi_blessingofwaves_1: Provides shield when you are at full HP.
mika_epi_blessingofwaves_2: You can play it after spending all AP as a finisher card.
mika_epi_whirlpool_1: At cost 1, it can provide AP if there are many enemies.
mika_set_1: Increases healing along with defense and survivability.
veronica_epi_repose_1: Repose with cost 0 allows it to be played for free.
veronica_epi_repose_2: Reduces the cost of a drawn card, recovering the value spent.
veronica_epi_sirkowalski_1: Draw 2 cards and generate a crossbow.
veronica_epi_sirkowalski_2: Draw 2 cards and increase the damage of a crossbow.
veronica_epi_firingpreparation_1: AOE crossbow that helps with clearing.
veronica_epi_firingpreparation_2: Chance to generate a double crossbow (as if it were a second critical hit).
